skills.name: ABSORB SOUL
desc: • Deals magic damage to all enemies.
• 50% Chance to Sleep each enemy for 1 turn.
• If an enemy is killed, Increase MAGIC for all allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: GOOD LUCK CHARM
desc: • 45% Chance for each ally to gain Regen HP for 3 turns.
• Heal amount is based on your MAGIC and MAX HP.

skills.name: UNDYING
desc: Endure a random ally for 2 turns at the start of your turn.
